item.description:
How about an afternoon at Seekonk Grand Prix and be a kid again?! There is a bunch to do and we can decide what we want to do then. If there is enough people, maybe break up into groups and try everything?

 

Featured Attractions:

In our state-of-the art facility we have over 60 arcade games to enjoy. Here are just a few, Dance Dance Revolution, Time Crisis 3 and Ski Ball. You can play some the latest redemption games, get tickets and win fabulous prizes.

 

Family Track
Our Family Track is the largest track of its kind in New England. At 1/4 mile in length this road course has everything from hairpin turns, a bridge, 2 tunnels and straight-away's too! Drivers must be at least 54” tall to operate this ride.Prices are $5.00 per ticket or 7 for $30.00.

Slick Track
A quick hand gets you around this slippery oval track very fast. Test your skills and race up to 12 of your friends. Drivers must be at least 60” tall to operate this ride. Prices are $5.00 per ticket or 7 for $30.00.

Bumper Boats
What's better than a ride in a boat? How about a ride in a bumper boat. Drivers must be 48” tall and passengers under 48” tall ride free with just one ticket. Prices are $5.00 per ticket or 7 for $30.00.

Bumper Cars
Have a blast bumping into friends and family with our awesome bumper cars. Drivers must be 48” tall and passengers under 48” tall ride free with just one ticket. Prices are $5.00 per ticket or 7 for $30.00.

Mini Golf
Finish the day off with a relaxing game of mini golf. Our 18 hole adventure golf course takes you through caves, across streams and past ponds. Our course is handicap accessible. Prices are $4.00 for adults.
item.how_to_find_us: Entrance doors closest to parking lot. I will send my number out the night before!
item.name: Seekonk Grand Prix!
